channel.title: The Bigfoot Show
channel.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
channel.description: An unscripted, unrehearsed, and sometimes moderately humorous discussion of the world of bigfoot.
channel.itunes:summary: An unscripted, unrehearsed, and sometimes moderately humorous discussion of the world of bigfoot.
channel.copyright: The Bigfoot Show is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 United States License.

item.title: BFS 036: Lyle Blackburn and the Beast of Boggy Creek
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Lyle Blackburn is on to talk about his excellent new book "The Beast of Boggy Creek: The True Story of the Fouke Monster"
item.itunes:subtitle: Lyle Blackburn is on to talk about his excellent new book "The Beast of Boggy Creek: The True Story of the Fouke Monster"
item.itunes:summary: Lyle Blackburn is on to talk about his excellent new book "The Beast of Boggy Creek: The True Story of the Fouke Monster"

item.title: BFS 035: The indescribable world of sasquatch IN COLOR!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Melba Ketchum and her five frolicking sasquatches, the Cryptomundo call for legal defense funds, Loren Coleman's latest desperate ploy for attention, and "new" wood ape photos from the Oklahoma prairie.
item.itunes:subtitle: Melba Ketchum and her five frolicking sasquatches, the Cryptomundo call for legal defense funds, Loren Coleman's latest desperate ploy for attention, and "new" wood ape photos from the Oklahoma prairie.
item.itunes:summary: Melba Ketchum and her five frolicking sasquatches, the Cryptomundo call for legal defense funds, Loren Coleman's latest desperate ploy for attention, and "new" wood ape photos from the Oklahoma prairie.

item.title: BFS 034: Bearsharktopus attacks!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The Finding Bigfoot crew appear on South Park, a BFRO-er has a run-in with the law, and a fair bit on the PGF. Plus, a great new book on the Beast of Boggy Creek and a seemingly weird one about people gone missing in the woods.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Finding Bigfoot crew appear on South Park, a BFRO-er has a run-in with the law, and a fair bit on the PGF. Plus, a great new book on the Beast of Boggy Creek and a seemingly weird one about people gone missing in the woods.
item.itunes:summary: The Finding Bigfoot crew appear on South Park, a BFRO-er has a run-in with the law, and a fair bit on the PGF. Plus, a great new book on the Beast of Boggy Creek and a seemingly weird one about people gone missing in the woods.

item.title: BFS 033: Christopher Munch
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Filmmaker Christopher Munch discusses "Letters From the Big Man" with the boys.
item.itunes:subtitle: Filmmaker Christopher Munch discusses "Letters From the Big Man" with the boys.

item.title: BFS 032: Titanium head plate
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Is Melba toast? What shocking bovine mystery is answered on Finding Bigfoot? Are bigfoot kleptomaniacs? What can you and Jeff Meldrum do in the woods with $350? All these answers and more on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Is Melba toast? What shocking bovine mystery is answered on Finding Bigfoot? Are bigfoot kleptomaniacs? What can you and Jeff Meldrum do in the woods with $350? All these answers and more on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.
item.itunes:summary: Is Melba toast? What shocking bovine mystery is answered on Finding Bigfoot? Are bigfoot kleptomaniacs? What can you and Jeff Meldrum do in the woods with $350? All these answers and more on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.

item.title: BFS 031: Kill 'em all and let Shiva sort 'em out
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The boys get heated over whacking a squatch plus more about Finding Bigfoot and a nine-year-old's questions. This show is a Ketchum-free zone!
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys get heated over whacking a squatch plus more about Finding Bigfoot and a nine-year-old's questions. This show is a Ketchum-free zone!
item.itunes:summary: The boys get heated over whacking a squatch plus more about Finding Bigfoot and a nine-year-old's questions. This show is a Ketchum-free zone!

item.title: BFS 030: Bag of Hands
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: What do North Koreans, Jimmy Stewart, Melba Ketchum, and Facebook all have in common?
item.itunes:subtitle: What do North Koreans, Jimmy Stewart, Melba Ketchum, and Facebook all have in common?
item.itunes:summary: What do North Koreans, Jimmy Stewart, Melba Ketchum, and Facebook all have in common?

item.title: BFS 029.5: Yetis among us
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: What does Melba Ketchum say about her feral human URL? Listen in to find out. Our first show recorded on new Yeti mics!
item.itunes:subtitle: What does Melba Ketchum say about her feral human URL? Listen in to find out. Our first show recorded on new Yeti mics!
item.itunes:summary: What does Melba Ketchum say about her feral human URL? Listen in to find out. Our first show recorded on new Yeti mics!

item.title: BFS 029: Filet o' Squatch
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Shoq
item.description: Bigfoot steak? DNA? Monkey in a tree? All this and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bigfoot steak? DNA? Monkey in a tree? All this and more!
item.itunes:summary: Bigfoot steak? DNA? Monkey in a tree? All this and more!

item.title: BFS 028: Newfangled mentalness
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Was Ben Radford treated fairly? What do we think of various other cryptids? What about this new Ohio sleestak video? Who's the new guy?
item.itunes:subtitle: Was Ben Radford treated fairly? What do we think of various other cryptids? What about this new Ohio sleestak video? Who's the new guy?
item.itunes:summary: Was Ben Radford treated fairly? What do we think of various other cryptids? What about this new Ohio sleestak video? Who's the new guy?

item.title: BFS 027: Projectile chimps
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The BFRO may have run over a bigfoot, Ben Radford explains why we're all nuts, and the TBRC releases a statement.
item.itunes:subtitle: The BFRO may have run over a bigfoot, Ben Radford explains why we're all nuts, and the TBRC releases a statement.
item.itunes:summary: The BFRO may have run over a bigfoot, Ben Radford explains why we're all nuts, and the TBRC releases a statement.

item.title: BFS 026: Sounds in the dark
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The boys chew over indisputable Yeti proof, the TBRC conference, and some interesting sounds recorded in the woods.
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys chew over indisputable Yeti proof, the TBRC conference, and some interesting sounds recorded in the woods.
item.itunes:summary: The boys chew over indisputable Yeti proof, the TBRC conference, and some interesting sounds recorded in the woods.

item.title: BFS 025: Deoxyribonucleic antics
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Together again, Scott, Paul and Brian spend the majority of the show discussing what they know and think of the Erickson Project along with a few other things.
item.itunes:subtitle: Together again, Scott, Paul and Brian spend the majority of the show discussing what they know and think of the Erickson Project along with a few other things.
item.itunes:summary: Together again, Scott, Paul and Brian spend the majority of the show discussing what they know and think of the Erickson Project along with a few other things.

item.title: BFS 024: Turtle free zone
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Catching up with the Herriott, a bit more on Finding Bigfoot, why anyone would want to go on a BFRO expedition, and what is it about people who are into this whole bigfoot thing, anyway?
item.itunes:subtitle: Catching up with the Herriott, a bit more on Finding Bigfoot, why anyone would want to go on a BFRO expedition, and what is it about people who are into this whole bigfoot thing, anyway?
item.itunes:summary: Catching up with the Herriott, a bit more on Finding Bigfoot, why anyone would want to go on a BFRO expedition, and what is it about people who are into this whole bigfoot thing, anyway?

item.title: BFS 023: Fallen ducklings
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The return of Paul Vella! We chat about Finding Bigfoot and keep trying to call Herriott out on the trail.
item.itunes:subtitle: The return of Paul Vella! We chat about Finding Bigfoot and keep trying to call Herriott out on the trail.
item.itunes:summary: The return of Paul Vella! We chat about Finding Bigfoot and keep trying to call Herriott out on the trail.

item.title: BFS 022: Survive!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Guests Daryl Colyer and Paul Bowman answer listener questions about basic wilderness survival techniques and the logistical challenges of long-term field research.
item.itunes:subtitle: Guests Daryl Colyer and Paul Bowman answer listener questions about basic wilderness survival techniques and the logistical challenges of long-term field research.
item.itunes:summary: Guests Daryl Colyer and Paul Bowman answer listener questions about basic wilderness survival techniques and the logistical challenges of long-term field research.

item.title: BFS 021: Discarded meat (and William Dranginis)
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Scott and Brian try to discuss the top bigfoot stories of 2010 but are distracted by Scott's new microphone, piles of discarded meat, and a smashing interview with William Dranginis.
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott and Brian try to discuss the top bigfoot stories of 2010 but are distracted by Scott's new microphone, piles of discarded meat, and a smashing interview with William Dranginis.
item.itunes:summary: Scott and Brian try to discuss the top bigfoot stories of 2010 but are distracted by Scott's new microphone, piles of discarded meat, and a smashing interview with William Dranginis.

item.title: BFS 020: Technically difficult
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The boys talk about the 100 best bigfoot personalities *ever* (according to some), camera shy coyotes, Bob Saget and gaseous emissions captured parabolically, and various videos of things that probably aren't sasquatch.
item.itunes:subtitle: The boys talk about the 100 best bigfoot personalities *ever* (according to some), camera shy coyotes, Bob Saget and gaseous emissions captured parabolically, and various videos of things that probably aren't sasquatch.
item.itunes:summary: The boys talk about the 100 best bigfoot personalities *ever* (according to some), camera shy coyotes, Bob Saget and gaseous emissions captured parabolically, and various videos of things that probably aren't sasquatch.

item.title: BFS 019: Moose and squirrel
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: TBRC conference recap, the Sierra Sounds, DNA, pancakes, film vs. video, and lots of other topics suggested by our Facebook fans.
item.itunes:subtitle: TBRC conference recap, the Sierra Sounds, DNA, pancakes, film vs. video, and lots of other topics suggested by our Facebook fans.
item.itunes:summary: TBRC conference recap, the Sierra Sounds, DNA, pancakes, film vs. video, and lots of other topics suggested by our Facebook fans.

item.title: BFS 018: The one after Holmes!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Scott and Brian talk about the McKenzie River video, Dallas n' Wayne, and lots of other interesting things Brian forgot to make notes about.
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott and Brian talk about the McKenzie River video, Dallas n' Wayne, and lots of other interesting things Brian forgot to make notes about.
item.itunes:summary: Scott and Brian talk about the McKenzie River video, Dallas n' Wayne, and lots of other interesting things Brian forgot to make notes about.

item.title: BFS 017: Holmes!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The one where we talk about the Bigfoot Forums for too long.
item.itunes:subtitle: The one where we talk about the Bigfoot Forums for too long.
item.itunes:summary: The one where we talk about the Bigfoot Forums for too long.

item.title: BFS 016: The one with the sandwich
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Scott and Brian yammer aimlessly about their summer adventures. Also, the Beast of Dartmoor. Also also, Brian eats a sandwich.
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott and Brian yammer aimlessly about their summer adventures. Also, the Beast of Dartmoor. Also also, Brian eats a sandwich.
item.itunes:summary: Scott and Brian yammer aimlessly about their summer adventures. Also, the Beast of Dartmoor. Also also, Brian eats a sandwich.

item.title: BFS 015: Polls, politics, and pet peeves
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: This time out, the boys discuss old polls, religion and politics (!), glowing red eyes, mysterious sounds in Michigan, and some old film made in Northern California. Contains at least 60% bigfoot-related content.
item.itunes:subtitle: This time out, the boys discuss old polls, religion and politics (!), glowing red eyes, mysterious sounds in Michigan, and some old film made in Northern California. Contains at least 60% bigfoot-related content.
item.itunes:summary: This time out, the boys discuss old polls, religion and politics (!), glowing red eyes, mysterious sounds in Michigan, and some old film made in Northern California. Contains at least 60% bigfoot-related content.

item.title: BFS 014: A pint of reason
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Scott and Brian discuss a hole in the ground, dermal ridges, the 10th anniversary of Dr. Matt Johnson's encounter, a very smart orangoutang, and several other topics suggested by people like you!
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott and Brian discuss a hole in the ground, dermal ridges, the 10th anniversary of Dr. Matt Johnson's encounter, a very smart orangoutang, and several other topics suggested by people like you!
item.itunes:summary: Scott and Brian discuss a hole in the ground, dermal ridges, the 10th anniversary of Dr. Matt Johnson's encounter, a very smart orangoutang, and several other topics suggested by people like you!

item.title: BFS 013: Crazy dead guy, etc.
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Paul's back! In this episode, they talk about Enoch some more, best bigfoot books, worst bigfoot movies, rednecks from North Carolina, and a crazy dead guy.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul's back! In this episode, they talk about Enoch some more, best bigfoot books, worst bigfoot movies, rednecks from North Carolina, and a crazy dead guy.
item.itunes:summary: Paul's back! In this episode, they talk about Enoch some more, best bigfoot books, worst bigfoot movies, rednecks from North Carolina, and a crazy dead guy.

item.title: BFS 012: Chris Bader and Carson Mencken
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Scott and Brian chat with Chris Bader and Carson Mencken, authors of the forthcoming book "Paranormal America". Then, Jerry briefs the boys on Autumn Williams' new book, "Enoch".
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott and Brian chat with Chris Bader and Carson Mencken, authors of the forthcoming book "Paranormal America". Then, Jerry briefs the boys on Autumn Williams' new book, "Enoch".
item.itunes:summary: Scott and Brian chat with Chris Bader and Carson Mencken, authors of the forthcoming book "Paranormal America". Then, Jerry briefs the boys on Autumn Williams' new book, "Enoch".

item.title: BFS 011: Yakima Bigfoot Round-Up round-up
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Catch all the fun as Brian, Scott, Paul and special guest star Jerry Riedel discuss the the Yakima Bigfoot Roundup (as well as the the minor brouhaha surrounding it).
item.itunes:subtitle: Catch all the fun as Brian, Scott, Paul and special guest star Jerry Riedel discuss the the Yakima Bigfoot Roundup (as well as the the minor brouhaha surrounding it).
item.itunes:summary: Catch all the fun as Brian, Scott, Paul and special guest star Jerry Riedel discuss the the Yakima Bigfoot Roundup (as well as the the minor brouhaha surrounding it).

item.title: BFS 010: Hey you kids! Get off my lawn!
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Which classic story stinks the most? What's wrong with MonsterQuest? Where have the BFRO gone wrong? Can Scott hold his water for 90 minutes!? These and other pressing issues are discussed on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Which classic story stinks the most? What's wrong with MonsterQuest? Where have the BFRO gone wrong? Can Scott hold his water for 90 minutes!? These and other pressing issues are discussed on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.
item.itunes:summary: Which classic story stinks the most? What's wrong with MonsterQuest? Where have the BFRO gone wrong? Can Scott hold his water for 90 minutes!? These and other pressing issues are discussed on this episode of The Bigfoot Show.

item.title: BFS 009: The misplaced episode
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: The long awaited return of Scott Herriot. This show was recorded back in November and "misplaced" until recently.
item.itunes:subtitle: The long awaited return of Scott Herriot. This show was recorded back in November and "misplaced" until recently.
item.itunes:summary: The long awaited return of Scott Herriot. This show was recorded back in November and "misplaced" until recently.

item.title: BFS 008: Kathy Strain
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Researcher and author Kathy Strain joins Brian and Paul to discuss her new book, Giants, Cannibals & Monsters: Bigfoot in Native Culture, the Georgia body hoax, and the passing of Tim Cullen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Researcher and author Kathy Strain joins Brian and Paul to discuss her new book, Giants, Cannibals & Monsters: Bigfoot in Native Culture, the Georgia body hoax, and the passing of Tim Cullen.
item.itunes:summary: Researcher and author Kathy Strain joins Brian and Paul to discuss her new book, Giants, Cannibals & Monsters: Bigfoot in Native Culture, the Georgia body hoax, and the passing of Tim Cullen.

item.title: BFS 007: Verne Langdon and his big-ass bird
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Hollywood make-up specialist and all around Renaissance man Verne Langdon joins Brian and Paul to relate his first-hand account of the origins of the Minnesota Ice Man, it's similarities with the recent Georgia hoaxed body, and, of course, the PGF.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hollywood make-up specialist and all around Renaissance man Verne Langdon joins Brian and Paul to relate his first-hand account of the origins of the Minnesota Ice Man, it's similarities with the recent Georgia hoaxed body, and, of course, the PGF.
item.itunes:summary: Hollywood make-up specialist and all around Renaissance man Verne Langdon joins Brian and Paul to relate his first-hand account of the origins of the Minnesota Ice Man, it's similarities with the recent Georgia hoaxed body, and, of course, the PGF.

item.title: BFS 005: Bigfoot Recession
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Recharged and rested following their extended "vacation", Scott, Paul, and Brian discuss the MK Davis bigfoot massacre, uncontacted Amazonians, Javan hippos, and the million dollar Bushnell trailcam award.
item.itunes:subtitle: Recharged and rested following their extended "vacation", Scott, Paul, and Brian discuss the MK Davis bigfoot massacre, uncontacted Amazonians, Javan hippos, and the million dollar Bushnell trailcam award.
item.itunes:summary: Recharged and rested following their extended "vacation", Scott, Paul, and Brian discuss the MK Davis bigfoot massacre, uncontacted Amazonians, Javan hippos, and the million dollar Bushnell trailcam award.

item.title: BFS 004: You should have gone before we left
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Paul Vella joins Brian, Scott, and Matthew. Topics discussed include BFS 003, Daniel Perez' track photos, YouTube bigfoot videos, the Lizard Man, and killer donkeys.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul Vella joins Brian, Scott, and Matthew. Topics discussed include BFS 003, Daniel Perez' track photos, YouTube bigfoot videos, the Lizard Man, and killer donkeys.
item.itunes:summary: Paul Vella joins Brian, Scott, and Matthew. Topics discussed include BFS 003, Daniel Perez' track photos, YouTube bigfoot videos, the Lizard Man, and killer donkeys.

item.title: BFS 003: Owen Caddy
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Owen Caddy discusses his work enhancing the Patterson-Gimlin film along with his opinions and observations of other bigfoot-related topics. Joined in the conversation with Owen is Brian, Scott, Craig, and newbie show producer, Matthew Gruits.
item.itunes:subtitle: Owen Caddy discusses his work enhancing the Patterson-Gimlin film along with his opinions and observations of other bigfoot-related topics. Joined in the conversation with Owen is Brian, Scott, Craig, and newbie show producer, Matthew Gruits.
item.itunes:summary: Owen Caddy discusses his work enhancing the Patterson-Gimlin film along with his opinions and observations of other bigfoot-related topics. Joined in the conversation with Owen is Brian, Scott, Craig, and newbie show producer, Matthew Gruits.

item.title: BFS 002: The Second Episode
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Craig Woolheater joins Brian and Scott as we try to figure out how to do this show more than once.
item.itunes:subtitle: Craig Woolheater joins Brian and Scott as we try to figure out how to do this show more than once.
item.itunes:summary: Craig Woolheater joins Brian and Scott as we try to figure out how to do this show more than once.

item.title: BFS 001: The Year in Bigfoot
item.itunes:author: The Bigfoot Show
item.description: Brian Brown and Scott Herrriot discuss the most important bigfoot-related events of 2007, as suggested by the readers of the Bigfoot Forums.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brian Brown and Scott Herrriot discuss the most important bigfoot-related events of 2007, as suggested by the readers of the Bigfoot Forums.
item.itunes:summary: Brian Brown and Scott Herrriot discuss the most important bigfoot-related events of 2007, as suggested by the readers of the Bigfoot Forums.
